sentences.sentence: He pointed to a bright red sleekly gleaming Ferrari in the parking lot.
sentences.translation: 他指着停车场上闪亮的，线条优美的红色法拉利说道。

sentences.sentence: In the kitchen, you set a bag of flour on the sleekly engineered stone counter.
sentences.translation: 到了厨房，你把一袋面粉放在精心设计的光滑的石台上。

sentences.sentence: Tree controls showed sleekly bitmap, so that your tree controls more beautiful, beautiful and practical!
sentences.translation: 树型控件显示真彩位图，使你的树型控件更加漂亮，美观，实用！
